summary.conference_name: The 33rd IEEE International Conference on Software Analysis, Evolution and Reengineering (SANER 2026)
summary.location: 5* St. Raphael Resort and Marina, Limassol, Cyprus

call_for_papers.description: Invites high-quality submissions of original and unpublished research results.
topics_of_interest: AI for Software Engineering and Software Engineering for AI
Generative AI and LLM applied to analysis, evolution and reengineering of software
Software Analysis, Parsing, and Fact Extraction
Software Maintenance and Evolution, Evolution Analysis
Software Architecture Recovery and Reverse Architecting
Mining Software Repositories and Software Analytics
Software Release Engineering, Continuous Integration and Delivery
Software Tools for Software Evolution and Maintenance
Human factors and legal aspects in the context of Software Analysis, Evolution and Reengineering
Empirical studies on the above topics
Education related to the above topics

submission_instructions.originality: Submissions must be original, not published, accepted, or under review elsewhere.
submission_instructions.format: PDF format and conform to the IEEE Conference Proceedings Formatting Guidelines.

tracks.Industrial Papers Track: Submissions should not exceed 12 pages for full papers; talk proposals should not exceed 2 pages.
tracks.Short Papers and Posters Track: Submissions should not exceed 6 pages; posters should not exceed 2 pages.
tracks.Reproducibility Studies and Negative Res: Submissions should not exceed 5 pages for appendices; 12 pages for new studies.

submission_instructions.note: Research, Short Papers and Posters, ERA, and RENE Tracks follow a double-anonymous review process.

call_for_papers.special_journal_issue: Selected papers may be invited to submit revised versions for a special issue in Springerâ€™s EMSE Journal.

workshops_call.description: Proposals for workshops to be held with the main conference.

submission_instructions.format: Call for papers in the form of a PDF or a public link.
requirements: A description of the workshop topic and scope
Indication of workshop length (half or full day)

tutorials_call.description: Invites proposals for tutorials on topics related to Software Analysis, Evolution, and Reengineering.

submission_instructions.format: Proposal should not exceed one page with one additional page for references.
